caption.p:
Plant pathogens detected using ancient DNA in rodent middens from the central Atacama. Empty circles represent midden samples where the plant pathogen taxon was not detected. The data are shown in relation to the local timing of the Central Andean Pluvial Event (CAPE)
28 and alongside a precipitation curve for the Bolivian Altiplano
53 ~600â€‰km to the north of the study area.
